column2: The piece says that 68m people were forced to flee in 2017. According to UNHCR numbers, 2.6m (net) were displaced in 2017 up from 65.4m in 2016. Thus, the total number of displaced persons in 2017 was 68m, not necessarily that 68m were displaced.
